title: Designing Interactive Multimedia Materials for Advanced Science Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and experimental methods
context.additional_context: Strengthening Competency in Designing and Utilizing Multimedia Materials Optimized for Smartphone-Based Learning Environments

learning_goals: Learners achieve the ability to design science concept explanations using interactive multimedia materials
Learners can produce smartphone-based experimental simulation materials in limited-technology environments
Learners can execute science education content development processes by applying learning design models

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
